query:
INSERT INTO ai_recommendations (user_id, recommendation_type, title, description, action_data, status, priority, expires_at, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES 
  (1, 'workflow_suggestion', 'Automate Stream Milestone Celebrations', 'Set up a workflow to automatically thank fans when you hit streaming milestones. This increases engagement and builds stronger fan relationships.', '{"workflowTemplate": "stream_milestone_celebration", "threshold": 10000}', 'pending', 8, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), NOW(), NOW()),
  (1, 'revenue_optimization', 'Enable Instant Payouts', 'You have $127.50 available. Enable instant payouts to access your earnings in 1 hour for just a 1% fee ($1.28).', '{"action": "enable_instant_payout", "amount": 12750}', 'pending', 9, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY), NOW(), NOW()),
  (1, 'growth_opportunity', 'Upload to Third-Party Platforms', 'Your track "Summer Vibes" is performing well on BAP. Consider distributing it to Spotify and Apple Music to maximize reach.', '{"action": "distribute_track", "trackId": 1, "platforms": ["spotify", "apple_music"]}', 'pending', 7, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY), NOW(), NOW());
command:

Consider distributing it to Spotify and Apple Music to maximize reach.', '{"action": "distribute_track", "trackId": 1, "platforms": ["spotify", "apple_music"]}', 'pending', 7, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY), NOW(), NOW());
